choices: An even darker forest. (The Forest of Magic)
1.content: You're not sure what happened. You decided to take a shortcut through the woods on your way to take picture of a famous abandoned shrine, but this forest seemed to go on forever. You were starting to get seriously worried that you were lost when you wandered out into...
1.title: Spirited Away

choices: The shrine you were looking for!
15.content: You looked at your surroundings...
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: A human wanders into Gensokyo and the denizens see them as a new plaything.
info.description:
Gensokyo, the land of fantasy where many youkai and humans reside. Outsiders are rare, but when they do show up they are easy prey for the many mythical creatures that lurk in the forests and mountains. Will you make it safely to a human settlement? Or will you find yourself spirited away?

RULES:
-I expect to see farting, feet, facesitting, really anything you can think of that stinks.
